verses.roman:
rāmānanda rāya śuni' prabhura āgamana
ānande āsiyā kaila prabhu-saha milana

synonyms: rāmānanda rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; śuni'-hearing; prabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āgamana—return; ānande—in great happiness; āsiyā—coming; kaila—did; prabhu-saha—with Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; milana—meeting.
translation: When Rāmānanda Rāya heard of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's arrival, he was very much pleased, and he immediately went to see Him.
